comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: So basically you need a tip of 5$ from ko-fi.com website using a credit card or PayPal in exchange of 10USDT, I have a credit card and I can tip you. Please let me know if you still need this deal and interested to pay me with USDT or BTC we can do it from PMs or telegram.If you are ready now , I will get in touch with you but only with this username : @masterxceWarning:  someone opened another telegram with similar username with the same PP, surely he is trying to trick people so be carful contacting the other username.
